primevc.gui.utils.UIElementActions

type
class
Utility to remove redundant code from IUIElements. The methods below will perform the requested actions and will play an effect on the IUIelement if one is defined.

Static Methods

inline doHide(target : primevc.gui.core.IUIElement) : Void

inline doMove(target : primevc.gui.core.IUIElement, ?newX : Int, ?newY : Int) : Void

inline doResize(target : primevc.gui.core.IUIElement, ?newW : Int, ?newH : Int) : Void

inline doRotate(target : primevc.gui.core.IUIElement, v : Float) : Void

inline doScale(target : primevc.gui.core.IUIElement, newScaleX : Float, newScaleY : Float) : Void

inline doShow(target : primevc.gui.core.IUIElement) : Void
